title: Synthesis of polyaniline-coated composite anion exchange membranes based on polyacrylonitrile for the separation of tartaric acid via electrodialysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29648-29657
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05508J, Paper

Khurram, Abdul Ghaffar, Sonia Zulfiqar, Muzzamil Khan, Muhammad Latif, Eric W. Cochran
The separation and purification of tartaric acid are essential in food and pharmaceuticals due to its roles as a chiral catalyst, antioxidant, and stabilizer, ensuring product quality and efficiency in these industries.
